price: 26. Tusaalaha Kelmedda xunna waa sida geed xun8 laga rujiyey dhulka korkiisa oo aan laheyn sugnaan.
arabic: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَةٖ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ ٱجۡتُثَّتۡ مِن فَوۡقِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِن قَرَارٖ
footnotes: 8. Waxaa soo galaya kelmedda xun: Gaalnimada, shirkiga, iyo qowl kasta oo xun, iyo xumo falka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-arḍi mā lahā min qarārin
